name: Voidbeam Emitter
customPrimary: At full strength, hits on hull or armor may arc to weapons and engines, dealing extra EMP and energy damage. Hits on shields may generate a shield-penetrating arc based on the target's hard flux level. The chance to generate an EMP arc is greatest at maximum range and falls off at close range.
customAncillary: Deals %s of damage as hard flux to shields at close range, degrading to %s at maximum range.

name: Chromatic Bolt Carrier
customPrimary:
Generates a cloud of unstable energy that deals no damage and passes through inert and small objects. When in close proximity to a ship or fighter, the cloud instantaneously condenses into a volley of %s projectiles that converge on the target and deal %s damage each.

The energy cloud's affinity cycles continuously and heavily influences its projectiles' composition.

name: Ultra Blaster
customPrimary: Hits on hull or armor cause %s to %s secondary explosions around the impact point that each deal %s high-explosive damage.

name: Chaos Pulser
customPrimary: Fires projectiles of varying strength that deal anywhere from %s to %s damage. Weaker projectiles are significantly more likely to be generated. Stronger projectiles are unstable and prone to erratic movement.
